With a growl and fright response, Nightshift's fur goes a complete fluff.  =
He raises his back, snarls, ears go flat back on his head as he exposes pea=
rly white teeth.   He does not let onto his true identity and continues to =
act like a true panther.  He roars and crouches, and takes a few swipes at =
his oncoming   restraints.   This fuss is followed by a feline hiss as whis=
kers lift upward as the cat continues his protest.
